summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 271 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1852 m), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 270.8m lower than yesterday, 792.9m lower than the past week, 1852.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 796.2m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok and little or no wind. Light to moderate rain is forecast, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dim outside. Changeable conditions.
